doc.name: StaticSchedulingDirectorAttributes
doc.description: Container for decorator attributes that are provided to actors.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: Indicator of whether to pad buffers. This is a boolean that defaults to true.
Indicator of whether to allow dynamic multiport references. If true, then channels in multiports can be dynamically referenced using the $ref macro. This is a boolean that defaults to false.
